verses.verse: In <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G3827>very<s%> <S%G3827>great,<s%> and <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3385>nothing<s%> to <S%G5315>eat,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them,

I have <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they have <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G4357>been<s%> with me <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> to eat: <S%G5315><s%>

And <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G630>send<s%> them <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G3523>fasting<s%> to their own <S%G3624>houses,<s%> they will <S%G1590>faint<s%> by the <S%G3598>way:<s%> for <S%G5100>divers<s%> of them <S%G2240>came<s%> from far. <S%G3113><s%>

And his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, From <S%G4159>where<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5526>satisfy<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> men with <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> in the <S%G2047>wilderness?<s%>
And he <S%G1905>asked<s%> them, <S%G4214>How<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> you? And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2033>Seven.<s%>

And he <S%G3853>commanded<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> to <S%G377>sit<s%> <S%G377>down<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>ground:<s%> and he <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G740>loaves,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> and <S%G2806>broke,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> them; and they did <S%G3908>set<s%> them <S%G3908>before<s%> the <S%G3793>people.<s%>

And they <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G2485>small<s%> <S%G2485>fishes:<s%> and he <S%G2127>blessed,<s%> and <S%G2036>commanded<s%> to <S%G3908>set<s%> them <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> them.

<S%G1161>So<s%> they did <S%G5315>eat,<s%> and were <S%G5526>filled:<s%> and they <S%G142>took<s%> up of the <S%G2801>broken<s%> meat that was <S%G4051>left<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4711>baskets.<s%>
And they that had <S%G5315>eaten<s%> were <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G5070>four<s%> <S%G5070>thousand:<s%> and he <S%G630>sent<s%> them <S%G630>away.<s%>

And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> he <S%G1684>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship<s%> with his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3313>parts<s%> of <S%G1148>Dalmanutha.<s%>

And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G4802>question<s%> with him, <S%G2212>seeking<s%> of him a <S%G4592>sign<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3985>tempting<s%> him.

And he <S%G389>sighed<s%> <S%G389>deeply<s%> in his <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Why<s%> does <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> <S%G1934>seek<s%> <S%G1934>after<s%> a <S%G4592>sign?<s%> <S%G281>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, There shall <S%G1487>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> be <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G5026>this<s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>
And he <S%G863>left<s%> them, and <S%G1684>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G565>departed<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side.<s%>

<S%G2532>Now<s%> the disciples had <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> they in the <S%G4143>ship<s%> with them <S%G1508>more<s%> <S%G1508>than<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G740>loaf.<s%>

And he <S%G1291>charged<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Take <S%G3708>heed,<s%> <S%G991>beware<s%> of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> and of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of Herod. <S%G2264><s%>
And they <S%G1260>reasoned<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G240>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> It is <S%G3754>because<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> it, he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G1260>reason<s%> you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread?<s%> <S%G3539>perceive<s%> you not <S%G3768>yet,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G4920>understand?<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> you <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> hardened? <S%G4456><s%>
<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G991>see<s%> you not? and <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3775>ears,<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> you not? and do you not remember? <S%G3421><s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> I <S%G2806>broke<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G2801>fragments<s%> <S%G142>took<s%> you up? They <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G1427>Twelve.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G5070>four<s%> <S%G5070>thousand,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> <S%G4138>full<s%> of <S%G2801>fragments<s%> <S%G142>took<s%> you up? And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2033>Seven.<s%>
And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4459>How<s%> is it that you do not understand? <S%G4920><s%>
And he <S%G2064>comes<s%> to <S%G966>Bethsaida;<s%> and they <S%G5342>bring<s%> a <S%G5185>blind<s%> man to him, and <S%G3870>sought<s%> him to <S%G680>touch<s%> him.

And he <S%G1949>took<s%> the <S%G5185>blind<s%> man by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G1806>led<s%> him out of the <S%G2968>town;<s%> and when he had <S%G4429>spit<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> his <S%G3659>eyes,<s%> and <S%G2007>put<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> on him, he <S%G1905>asked<s%> him <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G991>saw<s%> <S%G5100>ought.<s%>
And he <S%G308>looked<s%> up, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> I <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> as <S%G1186>trees,<s%> <S%G4043>walking.<s%>

<S%G1534>After<s%> that he <S%G2007>put<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> on his <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and <S%G4160>made<s%> him <S%G308>look<s%> up: and he was <S%G600>restored,<s%> and <S%G1689>saw<s%> <S%G537>every<s%> man <S%G5081>clearly.<s%>

And he <S%G649>sent<s%> him <S%G649>away<s%> to his <S%G3624>house,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3366>Neither<s%> <S%G1525>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>town,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> it to <S%G5100>any<s%> in the town. <S%G2968><s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>towns<s%> of <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi:<s%> and by the <S%G3598>way<s%> he <S%G1905>asked<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Whom<s%> do <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that I am? <S%G1511><s%>
And they <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist;<s%> but <S%G243>some<s%> say, <S%G2243>Elias;<s%> and <S%G243>others,<s%> <S%G1520>One<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, But <S%G5101>whom<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> you that I am? <S%G1511><s%> And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answers<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, You <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
And he <S%G2008>charged<s%> them that they should <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> of him.

And he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> them, that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things, and be <S%G593>rejected<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> and of the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests,<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> and be <S%G615>killed,<s%> and <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%>
And he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> that <S%G3056>saying<s%> <S%G3954>openly.<s%> And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G4355>took<s%> him, and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> him.

But when he had <S%G1994>turned<s%> <S%G1994>about<s%> and <S%G1492>looked<s%> on his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> he <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5217>Get<s%> you <S%G3694>behind<s%> me, <S%G4567>Satan:<s%> for you <S%G5426>mind<s%> not the things that be of <S%G2316>God,<s%> but the things that be of men. <S%G444><s%>

And when he had <S%G4341>called<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> to him with his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> also, he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G3748>Whoever<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> me, let him <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G142>take<s%> up his <S%G4716>cross,<s%> and <S%G190>follow<s%> me.

For whoever <S%G3736><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> it; but whoever <S%G3736><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> for my <S%G1752>sake<s%> and the <S%G2098>gospel's,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> shall <S%G4982>save<s%> it.

For <S%G5101>what<s%> shall it <S%G5623>profit<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he shall <S%G2770>gain<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G2210>lose<s%> his own soul? <S%G5590><s%>
<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> in <S%G465>exchange<s%> for his soul? <S%G5590><s%>

Whoever <S%G3736><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G1063>therefore<s%> shall be <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of me and of my <S%G3056>words<s%> in <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3428>adulterous<s%> and <S%G268>sinful<s%> <S%G1074>generation;<s%> of him <S%G2532>also<s%> shall the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G1870>ashamed,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of his <S%G3962>Father<s%> with the <S%G40>holy<s%> angels. <S%G32><s%>
